players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Diana: "I am innocent and need your help to catch the mafia"
Diana: "I am innocent and need your help to catch the mafia. I saw Bob last night, he was alive when I left him."
Charlie: "I saw Bob last night and he was alive. I believe the mafia is lying about his death."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
